Requirements: Android 2.2 and up
Overview: Zombies, Run! is an ultra-immersive running game and audio adventure


You tie your shoes, put on your headphones, take your first steps outside. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve barely covered 100 yards when you hear them. They must be close. You can hear every guttural breath, every rattling groan - theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re everywhere. Zombies. ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only one thing you can do: Run!

Zombies, Run! is an ultra-immersive running game and audio adventure, co-created with award-winning novelist Naomi Alderman. We deliver the story straight to your headphones through orders and voice recordings - and when you get back home, you use the supplies youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve collected while running to build and grow your base.

WALK, JOG, OR RUN ANYWHERE
Zombies, Run! works anywhere and at any speed. You can jog in a park, run along a beach, or walk along a trail.

What's in this version:
Fixed:
- We fixed the "missions not completing" issue that many players experienced this weekend. Your phone will now correctly show missions you've already run as completed.
New:
- LONG PLAY MODE. Do you run for more than an hour? Adjust your mission length to suit on the settings page.
- Seven supply missions that you can play again and again
- Review your runs - on the missions screen, choose "Run Logs" from the menu
